definition: water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes

sentences.english: But now a swarm of piranhas is feasting on the prize.
sentences.chinese: 但這時一大羣水虎魚在享用這頓大餐。

sentences.english: Piranha fish live in the lakes, and electric eels.
sentences.chinese: 湖裏有水虎魚，還有電鰻。
